'''Pairidaeza's Dreams''' is [[Kaveh]]'s Level 6 [[Constellation]].

==Trivia==
* Pairidaeza's Dreams may make reference to {{w|Paradise garden|Old Iranian paradise gardens}}, which are enclosed symmetrical gardens most traditionally split into quarters and surrounding a central pond. It also references the in-game [[The Orchard of Pairidaeza|Orchard of Pairidaeza]], the final resting place of [[Nabu Malikata]].
